title: property for sale in Negombo
details: Two storey air conditioned( with LG art cool), house with a garden for sale . 2 mins. to Negombo-Colombo road, 5 mins. to Negombo town. Lobby,living, dinning,Kitchen with pantry, 3 bed rooms, 3 attached bathrooms (with shower & bath-tub), store- room or (servant room), balcony, car porch. arround 3000 square feet. solar power (electric power functionable) hot water system , Tap water with pressure pump. upper & down water tanks. Garbage service 3 times a week. House and Garden spacious & comfy. land area 18 P.
